casebody.data:
Thomas F. McCarthy et al., Executors (Estate of Timothy F. McCarthy) v. Marion McCarthy

King, C. J., Alcorn, House, Thim and Ryan, Js.

Argued November 12 decided November 13, 1969 Thomas L. Brayton, for the appellants (plaintiffs). Vincent Matasavage, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

In the light of Prince v. Sheffield, 158 Conn. 286, 299, 300, 259 A.2d 621, there is error. The judgment is set aside and the case is remanded to the Superior Court for a new trial of the appeal from the Probate Court.
